#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t)
    {
		int n,i;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		cin>>a[i];
		}
    sort(a,a+n);
    if(n%2==0)cout<<-1<<"\n";
    else cout<<a[n/2]<<"\n";
    t--;
    }
	
}
